item.title: Sony
item.description:
is providing us with 10 Sony SmartWatch 2's. During the hackathon, the teams can use these to incorporate this cool piece of 'tech' into their solution. At the end of the hackathon we will be able to also hand some out to the contestants!

To get started with the Sony Smart Extension APIs, check out this site.

item.title: i'm Watch
item.description:
is providing us with 9 i'm Smart smart watches. During the hackathon, the teams can use these to incorporate this cool piece of 'tech' into their solution. At the end of the hackathon we will be able to also hand one out as a prize !

To be prepared and jump-start development for the i'm Smart smart watches on the hackathon checkout this site for more information.
